title: mahilO ambA
sahitya:
mahilO ambA nIdu mahimAtishayamenna taramA


anupallavi

  ahi bhUSaNuni rANI shankari ambikA brhannAyaki gaurI


caraNam 1    sArasadaLa nayanA vadana sarOja vijitA ghana purArivai 
rANi varA mosagipmavE birAna brOcina parAshakti gadA
    caraNam 2    sumEru madhyalatA lalitA ramicuvinu nE kumAruDananucu 
mA talli nIvu mAnavatI nI samAnamevaru ilalO jeppavammA
    caraNam 3    sAmagAnanutA sarasapadA tAmasamu jEsE tALanE 
shyAmakrSNa sOdarI shankarI shyAmaLAmbA nIvE mAyammA
